HwarangElite.name: HwarangElite
abilities: Gains +60% strength and heals 20 HP after defeating a unit on Desert or Friendly territory
Adjacent friendly units gain +20% combat strength

QAnonBeliever.name: QAnonBeliever
abilities: All adjacent enemy Mechanized units have their combat strength reduced to 0
Each QAnonBeliever reduces civilization Science output by 5%
Each QAnonBeliever increases Faith output by 5%
Each QAnonBeliever causes -30 diplomatic favor with Rationalist civilizations
Each QAnonBeliever grants +30 diplomatic favor with civilizations of the same religion
